text: Israel José Rubio Rivero (born 11 January 1981) is a Venezuelan weightlifter. Rubio originally placed 4th in the men's 62kg weightlifting competition at the 2004 Summer Olympics in Athens, Greece, but was moved to third place and received a bronze medal when the previous bronze medalist, Leonidas Sampanis, was stripped of his medal following a doping scandal. At the 2008 Summer Olympics he ranked 13th in the men's 69kg weightlifting competition, lifting a total of 306 kg. Rubio was arrested on January 25, 2012 in the city of Pescara, Italy, for alleged possession of narcotics.http://www.abruzzoweb.it/contenuti/pescara-spaccio-di-droga- arrestati-4-sudamericani-/45084-4/ ==References== * ==External links== * Israel Rubio at databaseolympics.com * Athlete Biography RUBIO Israel Jose at beijing2008 * Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:Venezuelan male weightlifters Category:Olympic weightlifters of Venezuela Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Venezuela Category:Weightlifters at the 2003 Pan American Games Category:Weightlifters at the 2007 Pan American Games Category:Weightlifters at the 2011 Pan American Games Category:Weightlifters at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Weightlifters at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Medalists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Venezuela Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Venezuela Category:Pan American Games medalists in weightlifting Category:Weightlifters at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:South American Games gold medalists for Venezuela Category:South American Games medalists in weightlifting Category:Competitors at the 2010 South American Games
